short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'minded' will help you fight social media addiction, doom-scrolling and procrastination and to focus on what really counts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
'minded' helps by offering positive alternatives to your bad browsing habits that will help you break the automatic behavior patterns associated. 

This is achieved by presenting users with various interaction prompts when they attempt to open websites, the user wants to use less. 

The answers to those prompts will be collected and a beautiful dashboard of it will be shown to replace the new tab page.
